name: Flappy Neonman
description:
Game Description

The game Flappy Neonman is simply a copy and variant of the famous game "Flappy Bird". This game was created for the Trijam #206 with the theme "just another copy".

Rules

You must dodge walls and dash between them to score points.

Controls

Space : Fly

E : Dash

Credits Sound
  • Music by DavidKDB.
  • SFX Kenney.
Font
  • Caviar Dreams font by Lauren Thompson.
